title: namba bEDi
sahitya:
namba bEDi.  rAgA:  pUrvi.  Adi tALA.
P;  namba bEDi nAriyaranu hambala hAraisa bEDi


anupallavi

  ambujAkSiyarolume Dambhakavendu tiLiyiro


caraNam 1    mTavella pusiyu satiyarATavella lncu sanne nOTavella ghanna ghAtakakUTavella vancane 
pATu geTTu hengaLoDane kOTale goNDu tiruga bEDi nITugAtiyarolume bUTakavendu tiLiyiro
    caraNam 2    sOtanandu viTage dainya matanADi maruLu goLisi kAtaravanu koTTu avana mAtA pitra tolagisi 
prIti paDisi haNava seLedu rIti geDisi kaDeyalavana kOtiyante mADi biDuva jAtikAra hengaLa
    caraNam 3    dharaNi janaru kELi lEsha karuNavilla nAriyarige eraLe kangaLa hengaLolume bareha nIramElina 
sarasa mukhiyariva nIvu baride nambi keDalu bEDi guru purandara viTTala rAyana caraNava nambi badukiro
